about_the_game:
Grab the Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass today, to get day 1 access to all 3 new cosmetic packs on release.

Light up the lake with the radiating Synthwave Pack, pick your Pixel Pro with the pixel art Bassmaster Elite Series™ anglers, or flashback to old school Bassmaster® with the Throwback B.A.S.S.® Pack’s vintage clothing & patches.

Synthwave Pack - June

Light up the lake with the new radiating clothing and boat wrap.


  • The first ever emissive neon Synthwave Boat Wrap
  • A full set of Mastery Challenges to unlock the special in-game glasses that glow
  • Synthwave designed Cap
  • Synthwave T-shirt
  • Unique Synthwave Pants with light up strips
  • Light up Sneakers

Pixel Pro Pack - July

Pick your Pixel Pro with pixel art Bassmaster Elite Series™ angler cosmetics.


  • Bassmaster Elite Series™ angler Pixel Pro top designs
  • Fully original Pixel Pro Boat Wrap
  • Pixel Art Bassmaster® Fishing 2022 Cap
  • Pixel Pro Sneakers to unlock with Mastery Challenges
  • Unique Pants to finish off your anglers look

Throwback B.A.S.S.® Pack - August

Flashback to old school B.A.S.S.® with vintage Bassmaster® clothing & patches.


  • Zip up jacket with traditional Bassmaster® Patches
  • Throwback B.A.S.S.® Pants
  • Cap with 25th anniversary styled B.A.S.S.® patch
  • Boat Wrap featuring a variety of classical B.A.S.S.® logos
  • New Sneakers colours to finish the set
  • Mastery Challenges for you to take on

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2Gb dedicated video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Grab the Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass today to get day 1 access to all 3 new cosmetic packs as they launch.Featuring:Synthwave Pack - Light up the lake Pixel Pro Pack - Pick your Pixel Pro with the pixel art Elite anglersThrowback B.A.S.S.® Pack - Flashback to old school Bassmaster®

English*, French, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
